nodes.text: The Thranta Clan was one of the many clans in which initiates were sorted at the Jedi Temple on Coruscant. Jedi Master Dooku was the main lightsaber combat instructor of Thranta Clan.

The Thranta Clan was brought back to the Star Wars canon in the 2019 original audio book Dooku: Jedi Lost, written by Cavan Scott. The Thranta Clan was originally created for the 2010 Star Wars Legends reference book The Jedi Path: A Manual for Students of the Force.
